subject: Missing parts
description_text:
Hello,
      I received my order today, but I am missing the baseplate kit. My
order number is SSN4123. Please let me know how we fix this problem! Thank
you

conversations.body_text: Hi Josh Byrd,    We sincerely apologize for the delay caused by the shortage of floor stock in our U.S. warehouse. We will ship your order immediately upon receiving the item today.

Ok! Thank you for the quick response. Let me know if there is tracking info
for this order.

On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 6:42â€¯AM service@simsonn.com

Hello,
     Unfortunately the package was somehow delivered to the wrong
address.... I am working to hopefully get the package from the home it was
delivered to. Why was the package not delivered to the same address that
the pedals were delivered to? Please explain?  This is a very old address
that is not linked to any of the accounts involved. FEDEX TRACKING :
887038347839
Hi Josh Byrd,    The address we provided is the same. It appears there was an error in FedEx delivery. We are currently investigating the matter and apologize for the inconvenience caused.
